title: Silvio Soldini - Giorni e nuvole aka Days and Clouds
description:
Silvio Soldini - Giorni e nuvole aka Days and Clouds (2007) <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0887732/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0887732/</a>

This story of a middle-aged, upper-middle class Genoa couple flailing in the wake of one partner's professional upheaval is clear-eyed and compassionate. The script taps into universal anxieties ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½ including the curious frustration of finding yourself overqualified for menial work ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½ while retaining a wonderful specificity of place and character. Where so many films about domestic stress descend into staginess and flat-out caricature, Days and Clouds presents us with recognizably flawed people, who happen to be flawlessly inhabited by stars Margherita Buy (a vision of fraying elegance) and Antonio Albanese (a portrait of dignity in reverse).
